title: Insert a new user
sql: INSERT INTO users (username, email, password) VALUES ('john_doe', 'john@example.com', 'P@ssw0rd');

title: Update user email
sql: UPDATE users SET email = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;

title: Get all orders with user details (INNER JOIN)
sql: SELECT orders.order_id, users.username, users.email, orders.total_amount FROM orders INNER JOIN users ON orders.user_id = users.user_id;

title: Get all users and their orders (LEFT JOIN)
sql: SELECT users.user_id, users.username, orders.order_id, orders.total_amount FROM users LEFT JOIN orders ON users.user_id = orders.user_id;

title: Get all orders even if user data is missing (RIGHT JOIN)
sql: SELECT orders.order_id, orders.total_amount, users.username FROM orders RIGHT JOIN users ON orders.user_id = users.user_id;

title: Get all users and orders (FULL OUTER JOIN - if supported)
sql: SELECT users.user_id, users.username, orders.order_id, orders.total_amount FROM users FULL OUTER JOIN orders ON users.user_id = orders.user_id;
